dialogue.speaker: Dev A
dialogue.line: This is a test of the voice reuse feature.

dialogue.speaker: Dev B
dialogue.line: We want to make sure that each character uses the same voice throughout the dialogue.

dialogue.speaker: Dev A
dialogue.line: I should sound the same in this line as I did in my first line.

dialogue.speaker: Dev B
dialogue.line: And I should maintain my voice characteristics too.
